attributes.additional_details: To reopen all the McDonald's in the uk

rejection.details:
The decision to open or close individual businesses or chains such as McDonalds is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

Under current Government guidance, food establishments such as McDonalds are permitted to remain open for food delivery or takeaway purposes should they wish: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close-guidance.

You could start a petition calling for the Government to allow all restaurants, cafes and other food establishments to open fully.
